amendment.description: Amendment allows the use of funding for supplemental multilingual computer software to train teachers to teach limited English proficient students.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-190 to allow uses of funds to train teachers to use supplemental multilingual computer software to train teachers to teach limited English proficient students.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Kildee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
